Ok.  try this.  Open up nautilus, the file manager, and navigate to /media
... there are only two folders for the cdrom 2 for the floppy and one with my windows files
try, from a terminal, 'sudo mkdir /media/camera; sudo mount /dev/sda1 /media/camera -ouser,umask=0; ls /media/camera'
You can lose data off a mounted drive if you don't unmount it safely and just disconnect it.  ;)
